mean_cn: n. 形势，局面，处境，状况，位置，场所，职位，职务
mean_en: all of the facts, conditions, and events that affect someone or something at a particular time and in a particular place
word_etyma: situat位于 + ion名词后缀 → situation 地理位置
sentence: I don't know what to do in difficult situations like these. Right? Left? Straight? I just don't know!
sentence_trans: 我不知道遇到这种复杂状况该怎么办，左走？右走？还是直走？我不知道！
